comment.author: 81158433@N08
comment._content:
This was my farther!  Lived in Chorleywood as did Margot Dulanty LSE.  Jean Cole, LSE married Sid Cole, Film Producer.  Teddy Richards + GRY went to the USA as LSE debating
team.  Joined HM Treasury as Press Officer. Note regisignation of Hugh Dalton < C of Ex.
The World Bank 1957-62, Head of Info. Then Geneva to join EFTA.  Four children:
Graham Dougal, Hazel Elizabeth, John Alister William, Caroline Dianne.  His 2nd wife,
Catherine (Swiss) lives at Chemin Verney 15, Pully, Vaud.  He loved smoking, a Scotch at 6pm on the dot, Golf and reading late in bed.  we all miss him and his sound quatations.
I followed as a Journalist and my daughter is an Author. grahamdougalyoung@hotmail.co.uk   25/6/12
